archimate:BusinessService.name: Customer Reference Data Management
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use: Customer reference data such as demographic, location and reference/address details are maintained for reference across the product and service fulfillment capabilities
General comment:
Business Purpose : Maintain customer reference information
Пример использования: Справочные данные клиентов, такие как демографические данные, сведения о местоположении и ссылочные данные/адреса, поддерживаются для справки по возможностям выполнения продуктов и услуг
Общее замечание:
деловая цель : Ведение справочной информации о клиенте
Service Domain - Customer Reference Data Management The customer reference data service domain maintains a potentially wide range of customer reference data that might be used in any interaction between the bank and the customer including relationship development, sales/marketing, servicing and product delivery. This can include general reference and contact details, customer associations, demographic details and some servicing preferences. Different information may be maintained for different customer types such as consumers and corporates.
Detailed Summary This service domain maintains a range customer relationship reference information covering aspects including general reference details, contacts and associations and demographic information.
Executive Summary This service domain maintains a range customer relationship reference information covering aspects including general reference details, contacts and associations and demographic information.
Examples Of Use Customer reference details are accessed to pre-populate an application form for a new product opportunity with the customer.
